Text: O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, todu i che̩nyo̩,
O me̩ gogbodo̩ O̩jo̩ e-amo̩jo̩,
O me̩ gogbodo̩ Ondu e-amodu,
Ẹne̩ kʼowñ kate ache e̩wñ aye inaina,
owñ kʼi nʼoji e̩wñ ema fʼefojale che̩,
owñ kʼi fʼane̩-ile̩ nadala bʼej omi ma,
owñ kʼi fʼugane̩ ugane̩ lile le̩ che,
olu kʼi nʼo̩da o̩ro̩ka,
ochu kpai ilawo ki nʼo̩da odu,
Tugbo e̩ne̩ kʼi Ijipti gwoda lef amo̩mo̩gba-wñ kʼi gwoda,
kʼi la kʼabo Israe̩l kwef uma dufu,
o̩wo̩ ukpahiu kpai o̩wo̩ kʼi nadala te̩ oñ i ne̩ che,
tugbo e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼOhimini Ekpikpa kpana meji,
kʼi la je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l ki lale gu alumeji-wñ du,
kʼi muda fu Fero kpai abo-wñ mi rinyo̩ ef Ohimini Ekpikpa le̩,
tugbo e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼabo-wñ le gu ef aje̩tachi du,
tugbo e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼamonu lile kpa le̩,
kʼi la fʼamonu ku ma wohi ma kpa,
Siho̩n, onu abo Amo̩r,
kpai O̩g onu Beshan,
kʼi la mʼane̩-ma ko che e̩wñ ogu,
owñ chʼe̩wñ ogu ñw Israe̩l adu-wñ,
Owñ la chʼe̩ne̩ ki dibekado wa e̩gba kʼa jʼef uña ki cho̩wo̩ wane̩ le̩,
i laño̩ mʼuwa gba bʼo̩wo̩ abo ku ma che wa o̩pe̩cha te̩,
owñ kʼi akʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩re̩la du je̩,
O me̩ gogbodo̩ O̩jo̩ e-efojale,
